Author: rpbigpapa
Title: [ANN] MIB Coin | Smartphone-only Mining | Masternodes Available!
Body: why would a miner need access to my photos and media unless your mining our privet data you need to change that before ill install it

Author: MIB_COIN
Title: [ANN] MIB Coin | Smartphone-only Mining | Masternodes Available!
Body: Hi rpbigpapa.  The access is required to save the keystore file on your mobile phone. The App automatically creates a MIB folder and saves the keystore file in the folder, and it is completely visible to the user and is under the user's control.

Author: MIB_COIN
